pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Face Cream 65g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Face Cream with Rosehip & Vitamin E, natural moisturisers to nourish skin. Non-greasy formula.

This light weight Face Cream combines the antibacterial power of Tea Tree Oil with natural, skin loving ingredients to moisturise and maintain clear skin, naturally. 

Hydrates skin without clogging pores
Restores the skin’s natural moisture balance after cleansing and toning
Contains a balanced blend of natural moisturisers including Macadamia Oil, Rose Hip Oil, Vitamin E and Shea Butter to restore the skin
Contains 100% pure Australian Tea Tree Oil to help maintain clear skin

Size: 65g

Non-Comedogenic?: Yes

Skin Type: Combination| Dry| Normal| Oily| Sensitive

Skin Condition: Breakouts

Shelf Life in Days: 1095

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Restores the skin's natural moisture balance after clensing and toning
• Hydrates skin without clogging pores
• Contains 100% pure Australian Tea Tree Oil to help maintain clear skin
• Non-greasy formula
• Suitable for all skin types

Warnings

For external use only. Skin patch before use. If sensitivity occurs discontinue use. Avoid contact with the eyes. Keep out of reach of children. Do not use if safety seal is broken.

Ingredients

Water, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Olivate, Cetearyl Olivate, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Xanthan Gum, Allantoin, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Limonene, Linalool.

Contains: 100% pure Australian Tea Tree Oil

Directions

After cleansing and toning, gently massage mornings and nights into the skin on face and neck area.

STORAGE AND DISPOSAL

Discard in 6 months after opening

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: below 30°C
